title: The Hindenburg of Media Failures | Guest: Bill Oâ€™Reilly | 4/22/22
description:
Glenn talks with Kelly, host of "A Time to Stand," regarding the pyramid of CRT, SEL, and SEC and how they all work together to brainwash children. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss the catastrophic failure of CNN+ shutting down after only a month and Glenn's Twitter thread toward CNN's Brian Stelter regarding the shutdown. Bill O'Reilly joins for his weekly news recap, including setting the record straight on his recent viral interaction at an airport. Idaho gubernatorial candidate Ed Humphreys joins Glenn to discuss why he's running against Idaho's current governor. Idaho Lt. Governor Janice McGeachin joins to discuss her gubernatorial campaign and her vision for the state.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
